author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shield Therapeutics Says ‍Receives EU Commission Approval For Broadening Of Indication For Feraccru To Treatment Of Iron Deficiency In Adults​
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Shield Therapeutics Plc:
* SHIELD THERAPEUTICS - ‍RECEIVES EU COMMISSION APPROVAL FOR BROADENING OF INDICATION FOR FERACCRU TO TREATMENT OF IRON DEFICIENCY IN ADULTS​
* SHIELD THERAPEUTICS - ‍EC ADOPTED DECISION TO EXTEND APPROVED INDICATION FOR FERACCRU TO INCLUDE TREATMENT OF ALL ADULTS WITH IRON DEFICIENCY OR WITHOUT ANAEMIA​
* SHIELD THERAPEUTICS- ‍EUROPEAN COMMISSION APPROVAL GOVERNS MARKETING OF FERACCRU IN ALL 28 EU MEMBER COUNTRIES, AS WELL AS ICELAND, NORWAY AND LIECHTENSTEIN​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
